name: E-Commerce Store
discription: A modern e-commerce website built with HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and JavaScript. Features include interactive product cards, add-to-cart functionality, adjustable quantities, remove-from-cart option, and smooth animations for an engaging user experience.

name: Weather App
discription: A responsive and modern movie website built with React and Tailwind CSS. Features dynamic carousels, smooth animations, and an engaging UI for movies, series, and cartoons.
